description:
If there was a race dedicated to removing Shimano® Hollowtech II cranks, then using this tool would likely be considered cheating. It’s designed to remove and install crank caps, with a built-in hook to lift the safety plate to speed things up.

  • Durable steel investment cast body
  • Option to use it with an 8mm hex wrench (not included) for seized caps
name: Park Tool BBT-10.2 Adjusting Cap Tool
